name: Goodbye, Miss Cyanide
description:
A short queer love story. You play as Caroline, a young queer girl who wants to ask out her crush, Penny, a waitress at her favourite diner. Caroline nicknamed Penny, Miss Cyanide.

Caroline has anxiety. You need to help her form the right sentences to woo Penny.

How To Play:

A mouse is highly recommended.

Press SPACE to progress dialogue.

When the minigame shows up, you must click on the word bubbles in the correct order to form a sentence. The wand must hit the bubble and you must click to select it. You have 60 seconds to do this, and your chosen words will appear at the bottom of the screen.

Click on the words to form the desired sentence. A green tick will appear if you have succeeded.

In the final scene, you will get the good ending if you succeed most of the sentence games.

Who am I?

I'm FennecFu, or Fennec. I'm a solo developer, and for this project I worked with my musical friend, Crispin Joseph, who made all the music for this game :)
